--------------------
Text: The First Easter Rabbit:  Created by Rankin/Bass, it tells the story of the Easter Bunny's origin and is loosely based on "The Velveteen Rabbit", a children's book by Margery Williams.

<Text: The First Easter Rabbit:  Burl Ives did the narration of this special which also featured the song "Easter Parade".>
Triplets:<Burl Ives
3:
--------------------
Text: The First Easter Rabbit:  After 1964's "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer", this is the second Rankin/Bass special to be narrated by Burl Ives.
Triplets:<Burl Ives
